Today in South Devon, Challborough and Bantham are lighting up with 3ft @10s SW swell, complemented by light 9 mph ENE winds. It's a great day to hit the water, especially during the tide window from 08:10 to 16:39. Tomorrow, conditions remain solid with 3ft @7s SW swell and light winds at 2 mph WNW, making it a fun day for all. Day after, the swell picks up to 5ft @7s SW with a gentle 8 mph SW breeze, offering some exciting rides. Best: day after.
